text.intro: This network visualization illustrates the Pak influence operation based on social media accounts and their interactions. Each node represents an account or entity, while the edges indicate connections such as shares, mentions, or interactions. The colors group nodes into communities detected through modularity analysis, revealing clusters of accounts that interact more frequently with each other. The size of the nodes reflects their degree of connectivity, highlighting the most influential actors within the network.
text.title: Pak influence op
